definition[0]: a successful period of time in someone’s life or in something’s existence
example[0]: My uncle was a famous radio personality in his day (=at the time he was most successful).
example[1]: Don’t be too disappointed you didn’t win – your day will come (=you will be successful in the future).
example[2]: Game shows like that have had their day (=were successful in the past, but are not anymore).
